author: deguio
body:
this PR supersedes #16408 and implements for online DQM:

- adds ZDCTask to monitor ZDC during HI
- extend the hcal2 app to process FEDs 1119, 1121, 1123
- add Qie11Task for pedestal runs

for full support of dual fed readout in dqm one additional PR should come.
title: Zdc task
